## compareAsc() function

Compare two dates and return a number. This method is used with sort().

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function compareAsc(left: Date, right: Date): number;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | Date |  |
|  right | Date |  |

**Returns:**
